ej,dawsa001,P,westj901,Called third strike ej,essij001,M,westj901,Called third strike $Cubs Andre Dawson was ejected by HP umpire Joe West for arguing the called third strike; Dawson appeared to bump West during the argument; Cubs manager Jim Essian was also ejected by West; after returning to the dugout, Dawson threw about a dozen bats onto the field, inciting the crowd; the fans threw a lot of trash onto the field; Dawson was fined $1000 and wrote on his check: 'Donation to the blind'

ej,dibbr001,P,westj901,Throwing bunted ball at batter/runner $Reds pitcher Rob Dibble, who had just served a three-day suspension, fielded the squeeze bunt and threw the ball at the hitter; Dibble was ejected by HP umpire Joe West
